attributes.action: put a tax on plastic shopping bags.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A direct tax on plastic shopping bags in Ireland has proved very effective in drastically reducing their use by shoppers.  This has resulted in less plastic litter in urban and rural environments as well as reducing the shocking waste of resources perpetuated by throw-away plastic shopping bags.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
